title: NIT Srinagar Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for Project Associate I Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology Srinagar (NIT Srinagar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Project Associate Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application.
